Is an object a particular model type?

Source: R/acf.R, R/arima.R, R/baggedModel.R, and 5 more
is.ets.Rd

Returns true if the model object is of a particular type

Usage

is.acf(x)

is.Arima(x)

is.baggedModel(x)

is.bats(x)

is.ets(x)

is.modelAR(x)

is.stlm(x)

is.nnetar(x)

is.nnetarmodels(x)

Arguments

x

object to be tested
